description: This file defines the 'EventFormScreen' widget for creating and editing calendar events in a Flutter application. It includes form fields for event details such as title, description, date, time, and color/category, along with validation and state management.

classes.name: EventFormScreen
classes.description: A StatefulWidget that provides a form UI for creating or editing an event.

methods.name: createState
methods.description: Creates the mutable state for this widget.

methods.name: _buildForm
methods.description: Builds the form UI, including input fields and action buttons.

methods.name: _pickDate
methods.description: Displays a date picker dialog to select the event date.

methods.name: _pickStart
methods.description: Displays a time picker dialog to select the event start time.

methods.name: _pickEnd
methods.description: Displays a time picker dialog to select the event end time.

methods.name: _save
methods.description: Validates the form and either adds a new event or updates an existing one in the event store.

methods.name: _strip
methods.description: Removes time components from a DateTime, returning only the date part.

methods.name: _fmtDate
methods.description: Formats a DateTime to a string like 'Jan 15, 2024'.

methods.name: _fmtTime
methods.description: Formats a TimeOfDay to a string like '1:30 PM'.
